We employ at least 10 full-time equivalent design personnel in our Design Center.
We conduct our design activities domestically.
Our company has sufficient design management capability and capacity to manage technological assets, human resources, intellectual property rights, projects, and information resources.
We have mechanisms in place to physically verify that personnel working in our Design Center are actually working in the design center.
We have programs and projects with defined duration, budget, and personnel requirements to be carried out in our Design Center.
Our Design Center is organized as a separate unit and is located in a single campus or physical location.
